actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution electing Representative MacKay of Florida to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and Representative Darden of Georgia to the Committee on Government Operations.

summary.text: Elects Representative MacKay, of Florida, to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and Representative Darden, of Georgia, to the Committee on Government Operations.

titles.title: A resolution electing Representative MacKay of Florida to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and Representative Darden of Georgia to the Committee on Government Operations.
